channel.title: NB Scape 718/742 || Daily Updates || Staff Needed || Zombies || Minigames
channel.description:
NB Scape
Play now: http://playnbscape.com
Home: http://nbscape.net
Forums: http://nbscape.net/forums/
Features: - 24/7 VPS 4gb Hosted - No Lag - Stable Eco - Daily Challenges - Clue Scrolls - Donor Zone - Old and new Runescape Armor - Loyalty point system with shop - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Warriors Guild - Random Events - Custom Home teles - Full abyss
Ive been working on this server and I believe its ready for some players. I will consider all suggestions that are posted on the forums.
Screenshots:
Abyss [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3136960/abyss.PNG[/img]
Challenges [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3136961/chall.PNG[/img]
Donator Zone [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3136969/Donator_zone.PNG[/img]
Home [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3136970/home.PNG[/img]
Tele's [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3136975/hometele.PNG[/img]
Thieving zone [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3136981/theving.PNG[/img]
Warriors Guild [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3136989/warriors_guild.PNG[/img]
Zombies [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3136996/zombies.PNG[/img]
